meanings.sent1: The etchers carefully carved intricate designs into the metal plate.
meanings.sent2: The museum displayed beautiful etchings created by talented etchers.
meanings.sent3: The etchers at the art studio joked about accidentally etching their own names onto the wrong piece.
meanings.sent4: The etchers' dedication to their craft was as sharp and precise as the tools they used.
meanings.sent5: Watching the etchers at work was like witnessing magic as images emerged from the metal surface.

meanings.sent1: The etchers gathered at the gallery to showcase their latest works.
meanings.sent2: In the exhibition, various etchers presented their unique styles and techniques.
meanings.sent3: The etchers' convention was a lively event with artists from all over the world.
meanings.sent4: The etchers' creations lined the walls, each piece telling a different story.
meanings.sent5: The room buzzed with excitement as the etchers unveiled their collaborative masterpiece.
